text: (Napiye!) Um'maic ciraippatuttavo, allatu um'maik kolai ceyyavo allatu um'mai (uraivittu) veliyerrivitavo nirakarippor culcciceytatai ninaivu kuruviraka avarkalum culcci ceytu kontiruntanar; allahvum (avarkalukku etirakac) culcci ceytu kontiruntan. Culcci ceyvoril ellam allah mikavum mennaiyutaiyavan
